Texts.Chs: 把^orange;菲洛合金宽剑^reset;带给^green;科学家^reset;(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Ferozium Cleaver^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 666！按照约定，这是你的报酬：^green;一个稀有的神器^reset;!它一直没啥卵用...
Texts.Eng: Excellent. And as promised, a reward: ^green;A rare artifact^reset;! It never did work for me...

Texts.Chs: 坦白地讲：我最喜欢的武器坏掉了，我需要换一把，如果你可以带给我一把^orange;菲洛合金宽剑^reset;的话，我会好好奖励你的。
Texts.Eng: I'll be frank: My favorite murder tool broke and I need a replacement. If you can bring me a ^orange;Ferozium Cleaver^reset; I'd compensate you for the effort.
